byline.contributor: Makiko Inoue and Hisako Ueno contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MOTOKO RICH and MAKIKO INOUE

abstract: Series of explosions in Utsunomiya, Japan, kill former military officer Toshikatsu Kurihara and injure three others; suicide note is found on Kurihara, and his home was burned to ground just before incidents; police are investigating and have not yet confirmed connection.

headline.print_headline: Suicide Note Is Reported After Blasts Near Tokyo
headline.main: Police Investigating Deadly Explosions North of Tokyo

snippet: One person was confirmed dead and three injured in a series of blasts in a parking lot and nearby park in Utsunomiya, Japan....
lead_paragraph: One person was confirmed dead and three injured in a series of blasts in a parking lot and nearby park in Utsunomiya, Japan.
